00001 /*
00002  * File: FileIO.h
00003  * --------------
00004  * File Input Class
00005  * Object for: parsing input files, Pops a line from file 
00006  * and makes each entry available to requesting object
00007  * ----------------------------------------------------
00008  * Copied from byer's code,             2/02/99  Huic
00009  *      Modified        02/15/99        Huic
00010  *              Remove the MPI, and change atof to the version 
00011  *              in strlib.h, which do the error checking.
00012  *
00013  */
00014 #ifndef FILEIO_H_
00015 #define FILEIO_H_
00016 #include <iostream>
00017 #include <fstream>
00018 #include <cstring>
00019 #include "strlib.h"
00020 
00021 const int MaxReadingLength = 256;
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 class FileIO {
00026  
00027 public:
00028         FileIO(const char* file);
00029         ~FileIO();
00030 
00031         // --- open/close file, set fin --- 
00032         void openFile(const char* file, ifstream &in);
00033 
00034         // --- Read a int, double, string ---
00035         int popInt();
00036         double popReal();
00037         void popString(char* ch);      
00038 
00039         // --- Read a double array ---
00040         void popRealArray(double* dva, int length);
00041         void popRealArray(double* dva, int length, double & max, double & min);
00042  
00043         // --- set the echo ---- 
00044         void echoOn() { mEcho = true; }
00045         void echoOff() { mEcho = false; }
00046 
00047 private:
00048         ifstream mFileIn;                                                                       // current input stream
00049         char* mFileName;                                                                        // input file name
00050         char buffer[MaxReadingLength];          // reading buffer
00051   
00052        
00053         bool mEcho;                                                                                             // input content display on screen?
00054     
00055         void comment();                                                                         // read in comment lines (start with #) 
00056         void readBuffer();                                                              // read a string                
00057         int readValue(double* d);                                       // read one entry
00058 
00059         // --- combine several input files into a big one (used for keyword INCLUDE) ---
00060         void combineIncludeFiles(ifstream &in, ofstream &out);  
00061 };
